name: estrategize-saas
description: Business strategy consulting platform with AI-powered diagnostics, credit system, and subscription management.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k --names backend,frontend -c auto "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.type-check: npm --prefix backend run type-check && npm --prefix frontend run type-check
